class.fighter.name: Fighter
class.fighter.description.short: A martial class with a broad range of expertise and ability. Can specialize into nearly any class of weapon, but has no magical ability.
class.fighter.description.long: The fighter embodies the spirit of martial mastery. Fighters represent the pinnacle of physical prowess and ability, with skills focused on their preffered style of combat and weapon specialisation.
class.fighter.loadout.peasant.name: Peasant
class.fighter.loadout.ranger.name: Ranger
class.fighter.loadout.skirmisher.name: Skirmisher
class.fighter.loadout.knight.name: Knight
class.fighter.loadout.warrior.name: Warrior
class.fighter.skill.armor_light_foot.des: Each piece of [key.item_tag.light] [key.item_tag.armor] you're wearing grants you {0} [key.stat.movespeed] and {1} [key.stat.stamina_regen].
class.fighter.skill.fleet.name: Fleet
class.fighter.skill.fleet.description: Reduces the penalty to movement when not moving forwards by {0}, increase your item swap speed by {1}.
class.fighter.skill.riposte.name: Riposte
class.fighter.skill.riposte.description: [key.trigger.on_parry]Your next {0} melee attack(s) within {1} seconds gain {2} attack speed.
class.fighter.skill.opportunist.name: Opportunist
class.fighter.skill.opportunist.descript: [key.trigger.on_stun]You gain {0} attack speed on your next melee attack for {1} second(s).
class.fighter.skill.cleave.name: Cleave
class.fighter.skill.cleave.description: While wielding a [key.hold_type.two_handed] weapon, deal an extra {0} damage for each enemy hit beyond the first during a swing. Stacks up to {1} times.
class.fighter.skill.sadist.name: Sadist
class.fighter.skill.sadist.description: [key.trigger.on_execute]Gain {0} [key.stat.grit] and restore {1} [key.stat.stamina] per second for {2} seconds.
class.fighter.skill.weight_training.name: Weight Training
class.fighter.skill.weight_training.desc: Your movement speed penalty during attacks with [key.hold_type.two_handed] weapons is reduced by {0} and your attack speed with them is increased by {1}.
class.fighter.skill.sword_retort.name: Duelist
class.fighter.skill.sword_retort.descrip: Your [key.mechanic.parry] window with [key.item_tag.sword](Swords) and [key.item_tag.dagger](Daggers) increases by {0} and you restore {1} [key.stat.stamina] on successful parries, but your [key.mechanic.block_guard] is reduced by {2}.
class.fighter.skill.cruel_blows.name: Cruel Blows
class.fighter.skill.cruel_blows.descript:
When attacking with a [key.hold_type.two_handed] weapon any excess posture damage dealt when stunning a target is converted into damage at a ratio of {0}.

Additionally, deal {1} more [key.stat.posture] damage with [key.hold_type.two_handed] weapons.
class.fighter.skill.push_forwards.name: Push Forwards
class.fighter.skill.push_forwards.descri: After taking damage, you can restore a portion of the health lost as [key.stat.grit] by dealing damage for up to {0} seconds.
class.fighter.skill.lunge.name: Lunge
class.fighter.skill.lunge.description: [key.trigger.on_activate]When wielding a [key.hold_type.two_handed] weapon, you may activate this ability to dash forward and perform a downward strike. Kills with this ability refresh its cooldown.
class.fighter.skill.blademaster.name: Blademaster
class.fighter.skill.blademaster.descript:
You can [key.mechanic.parry] with your opposite hand while attacking when [key.mechanic.dual_wielding] ([key.item_tag.shield](Shields) excluded).

Does not allow blocking during this window.
class.fighter.skill.lightning_reflexes.d: When you [key.mechanic.parry] a non-magical projectile it will be reflected in the direction you're looking
class.fighter.skill.sundering_strikes.de: Your melee attacks apply a {0} [key.stat.armor] penalty to the target for {1} seconds. Stacks up to {2} times.
class.fighter.skill.twin_strike.name: Twin Strike
class.fighter.skill.twin_strike.descript: If you strike a [key.mechanic.stun](Stunned) enemy with both weapons while [key.mechanic.dual_wielding] within {0} second(s) of each other, apply a {1} strength [key.status.bleed] and restore {2} [key.stat.stamina].
class.fighter.skill.executor.name: Executor
class.fighter.skill.executor.description:
[key.trigger.on_execute]If performed with a [key.hold_type.one_handed] weapon gain {0} [key.stat.movespeed] for {1} seconds(s) and apply a strength {2} [key.status.bleed].

In addition, you will instantly kill [key.mechanic.execute](Executed) targets put below {3} health.
class.fighter.skill.rhythmic_fighting.de: Each successive attack with alternating hands within {0} seconds gains {1} [key.stat.attack_speed] and {2} damage. Stacks up to {3} times.
class.fighter.skill.fang_and_claw.name: Fang and Claw
class.fighter.skill.fang_and_claw.descri: While [key.mechanic.dual_wielding] with a [key.item_tag.dagger] and another weapon of a different type ([key.item_tag.shield](Shields) excluded), gain {0} attack speed with the [key.item_tag.dagger] after each attack with the opposite weapon but at a {1} damage penalty.
class.fighter.skill.dual_weapon_fighting: Reduce the [key.stat.stamina] penalty for [key.mechanic.dual_wielding] by {0} and gain {1} [key.stat.movespeed] while [key.mechanic.dual_wielding].
class.fighter.skill.grit.name: Grit
class.fighter.skill.grit.description: [key.trigger.on_parry]Gain {0} [key.stat.grit] during your next {1} melee attack(s) within {2} seconds.
class.fighter.skill.armor_heavy_master.d:
While wearing all [key.item_tag.heavy] [key.item_tag.armor], if you would reduce the damage you take to below {0}, take no damage instead.

Increase stats from gained from [key.item_tag.heavy] [key.item_tag.armor] by {1}.
class.fighter.skill.steel_soul.name: Steel of Soul
class.fighter.skill.steel_soul.descripti:
[key.trigger.on_death]Instead of dying, enter a beserked state for {0} seconds. If you kill an enemy within that time you will prevent the death and be returned to {1} health.

This effect has a {2} second cooldown.
class.fighter.skill.shield_counter.name: Counter Bash
class.fighter.skill.shield_counter.descr: [key.trigger.on_parry]Your block will become active during your next melee attack with a [key.item_tag.shield] within {0} seconds
class.fighter.skill.shield_confidence.de: [key.trigger.on_block]Your next [key.mechanic.block] will automatically be upgraded to a [key.mechanic.parry] for the next {0} seconds.
class.fighter.skill.shield_mastery.name: Shield Mastery
class.fighter.skill.shield_mastery.descr: Your [key.mechanic.parry](Parries) with [key.item_tag.shield](Shields) can now break an enemies [key.stat.posture] and deal {0} more posture damage.
class.fighter.skill.shield_combo.name: Deflect and Return
class.fighter.skill.shield_combo.descrip: [key.trigger.on_block]After blocking with a [key.item_tag.shield], for {0} seconds the next attack with your opposite hand gains {1} attack speed and {2} damage.
class.fighter.skill.shield_daze.name: Dazing Blow
class.fighter.skill.shield_daze.descript: When you perform an [key.mechanic.execute](Execution) with a [key.item_tag.shield], restore {0} [key.stat.stamina] and [key.status.slow] that target by {1} for {2} seconds.
class.fighter.skill.shield_satisfying_cr: When you perform an [key.mechanic.execute](Execution) with a shield, gain {0} [key.stat.grit] and restore {1} [key.stat.posture] per second for {2} seconds.
class.fighter.skill.shield_perfect_defen: You may still attack with your opposite hand while blocking with a [key.item_tag.shield].
class.fighter.skill.shield_steady.name: Steady
